name: Seabound Rebound
description:
Premise:

On the high seas, there are legends of a dead ship with treasure beyond a pirate's wildest dreams.

This treasure is still haunted by the ghosts of the ship's crew and pirates whose souls were cursed trying to take the treasure for themselves. Do you want treasure? Survive the ghost crew's attack... or join them. Forever.

Controls: WASD
MoveLeft click
Shoot
Right click
Use powerup

Seabound Rebound is an arcade bullet hell where every bullet shot stays forever.

Powerups

  • Blue ice freezes bullets.
  • Red ball creates one big bullet.
  • Green star makes you invulnerable.

Scoring

  • Every 10 bullets adds x1 bonus multiplier.
  • The blue circle is your soul. It is a 1 pixel hitbox. Only your soul takes damage. Tempt fate and touch bullets without hitting your soul to increase your multiplier! If the bar on the players head runs out it resets the multiplier.
Credits:

Programming by Alex003

Audio by Juzek

Art assets from https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pirate-bomb

Notes:

Created in 4 days for Pursuing Pixels Jam 2022. Theme of permanence.
